about_the_game:
This is a text-based adventure game that tells a horror comedy story with a new twist on urban legends. You were just enjoying your coffee and singing along when you were looking forward to a romantic encounter with a charming lady. However, your date seems a bit off, and the entire romance becomes twisted and tainted with an unsettling shade of crimson.





· Sharing the same worldview with "Myth of Rules", this story unfolds in Earth 173, where demons roam freely and bizarre tales are rampant. As an ordinary person, it's quite reasonable to accidentally stumble into a trap. If you wish to pursue romance, please use legitimate dating websites instead of opening some automatically downloaded blind date site on your computer.
· The probability of a haunted location for blind dates has increased, and the glitch where your date is a normal person has been fixed.
· Even if your blind date is human, you shouldn't let your guard down, for they might be murderers possessed by bizarre tales within their bodies, driven insane by the influence of demons.





· As a hardcore internet surfer, it seems like you, as a player, has no merits other than reckless bravery, and you've consumed countless absurd horror comedies.
· Fortunately, your date isn't normal too, perhaps you two can resonate on the same frequency.
· Even if it's a demon, what of it? As long as you've got guts, even Sadako takes maternity leave.




· Don't let her love you too much, or she'll devour you.
· Don't make her hate you too much, or she'll shred you to pieces.
· My closet's moving, I don't want to play anymore!"" No, you need to confront your fears, break through her defenses, and make her fall in love with you. That's the only way to survive.




· A suave doctor traversing through dreams, striving to harness the power of nightmares.
· A headless maiden adorned with exotic heads, yearning to regain her own.
· A cursed doll named Alice, eager to play a game with you.

This is a text-based adventure game that tells a horror comedy story with a new twist on urban legends. You were just enjoying your coffee and singing along when you were looking forward to a romantic encounter with a charming lady. However, your date seems a bit off, and the entire romance becomes twisted and tainted with an unsettling shade of crimson.





· Sharing the same worldview with "Myth of Rules", this story unfolds in Earth 173, where demons roam freely and bizarre tales are rampant. As an ordinary person, it's quite reasonable to accidentally stumble into a trap. If you wish to pursue romance, please use legitimate dating websites instead of opening some automatically downloaded blind date site on your computer.
· The probability of a haunted location for blind dates has increased, and the glitch where your date is a normal person has been fixed.
· Even if your blind date is human, you shouldn't let your guard down, for they might be murderers possessed by bizarre tales within their bodies, driven insane by the influence of demons.





· As a hardcore internet surfer, it seems like you, as a player, has no merits other than reckless bravery, and you've consumed countless absurd horror comedies.
· Fortunately, your date isn't normal too, perhaps you two can resonate on the same frequency.
· Even if it's a demon, what of it? As long as you've got guts, even Sadako takes maternity leave.




· Don't let her love you too much, or she'll devour you.
· Don't make her hate you too much, or she'll shred you to pieces.
· My closet's moving, I don't want to play anymore!"" No, you need to confront your fears, break through her defenses, and make her fall in love with you. That's the only way to survive.




· A suave doctor traversing through dreams, striving to harness the power of nightmares.
· A headless maiden adorned with exotic heads, yearning to regain her own.
· A cursed doll named Alice, eager to play a game with you.
name: 相亲对象竟然是女鬼？

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3230M CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3220
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a text-based adventure horror & humor game. You are a restless college student who is lured into dangerous encounters with ghost women, murderers, and other supernatural beings through the enigmatic matchmaking site. You need to survive, making them blush, and let them fall in love with you.
